scripts.clean: shx rm -rf dist && shx rm -rf public/js
scripts.dist:js: shadow-cljs release prod && shx cp public/js/main.js dist/js/main.js && shx cp public/service-worker.js dist/service-worker.js
scripts.dist:html: shx cp public/index.html dist/ && shx cp public/manifest.webapp.json dist/
scripts.release: npm run clean && npm run dist:mkdir && npm run dist:js && npm run dist:css && npm run dist:html && npm run dist:img && npm run dist:bust
scripts.watch-css: npm run build-css && node-sass-chokidar --include-path ./src/css/ --include-path ./node_modules src/ -o public/ --watch --recursive
scripts.repl: echo 'write: (shadow/repl :dev) to get into the CLJS Repl.' && shadow-cljs clj-repl
